popupAnnouncement.ctaText: Discover MetaMask Portfolio today. Track and manage your web3 assets in one place!

seo.pageTitle: MetaMask SDK: Empowering Developers in the Web3 Space
seo.pageDescription: MetaMask SDK is a library that allows developers to connect their dApps to the MetaMask browser extension and MetaMask Mobile.

node.headline: Connect your dapp to MetaMask Wallet securely using MetaMask SDK BETA

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Connect with MetaMask

MetaMask provides the simplest yet most secure way to connect your blockchain-based applications to millions of MetaMask Wallet users via MetaMask SDK.

Our goal is to enable delightful user experiences for your apps that are built for diverse communities of users and use-cases, and compatible with various platforms.
MetaMask SDK simplifies integration with developer-friendly approach by working across multiple platforms.

• JavaScript >
    • Web apps >
      • ReactJS and similar
        frameworks >
      • Pure JavaScript >
    • React Native >
    • NodeJS >
    • Electron >

• Mobile Apps >
    • React Native >
    • iOS >
    • Android >

• Gaming >
    • Unity >
    • Unreal Engine
      (coming soon) >
MetaMask SDK is a library that can be installed by developers in their projects. It will automatically guide their users to connect easily with a MetaMask Wallet client.

sharedCopy.browserNotSupported: is not supported. Please download a browser that supports MetaMask.
